description:
If you have a Rubik's cube laying around and would like to conquor it once and for all, this course is for you. It takes you step by step from the hesitant first moves to the confident and satisfying last moves.

The course is an hour long and has multiple example solves at the end in order to give you an idea of how to combine what you have learned in a fluid manner. The video lectures are detailed and can be paused conveniently if you want to review a passage.

With this method you will be able to solve the cube from any scrambled position, so be warned, people will be dazzled and amazed upon your new skill. Other than only being able to solve the cube this method is speed optimal, so with a little practice your solving time will flirt with the one minute barrier.
title: How to Solve The Rubik's cube using a speed optimal method
